name: Granny's Adventure
description:
THE DOWNLOAD FILES HERE ARE INCORRECT
Correct Files: https://jeldrik.itch.io/grannys-adventure2

Try to protect your grandmother from any hazards while crossing the road.

Controls:

- Use the steak to distract the dogs
- Build bridges to get her over the water
- Chop down trees to clear her path
- Control the traffic lights to stop the cars
- Collect potions to heal her or get a score boost
